channel.title: Auto cache downloader Need help please!
channel.description: I got my no-ip and everything working and portforwarded and everything all i need is to make it to wear when someone downloads my client it downloads my cache and right now it doesnt do that unless my cache is in my c drive it doesnt re put it in there like its suppost to. Please help if you know how to help add me on skype: Modty1

item.title: Auto cache downloader Need help please!

There are plenty of these around… just have to look… http://lmgtfy.com/?q=Auto+Cache+Downloader

item.title: Auto cache downloader Need help please!
item.dc:creator: @RUNE-PK RUNE-PK
item.description:
@RUNE-PK wrote:

Twd1995:

What do you mean its called cache downloader in the cleint folder but when i go and run my client without my cache in the c drive it doesnt put it in there Got skype? Modty1

I did have a Skype but, As I was saying if you put the Cache with the client in the same folder then they can download it all, I did it on my latest release…

Read full topic
